manageProfile.tab.resume.upload.title: Upload your own resume
manageProfile.tab.resume.upload.tips: Resume is an essential tool to get you to the next step in your job hunting process. Impress recruiters with additional information from your Bossjob profile.
manageProfile.tab.resume.upload.support: Supported file type: PDF, DOC, DOCX. Max. file size: 5MB

manageProfile.tab.resume.bossjob.title: Bossjob resume
manageProfile.tab.resume.bossjob.tips: As you build your profile at Bossjob, we create your resume for you. You can choose from the available templates and use your newly improve resume to apply for job opening at Bossjob.
